name: Real Dice •
description:
• Realistic dice with configurable dice textures and colors.
• Select the surface you want to roll your dice on.
• Determine how many dice you want to roll and what the dice will look like.
• Dice roll is physically simulated.
• Dice can be dragged on surface.
• App will prompt you if any dice fell off the selected surface. It will then ask you if you want to restore the fallen dice or roll again the dice that are left.
• Beautiful and original organic, inorganic, plastic and metal dice textures.
• Organic textures: wood, leather, jute, grass and reptile.
• Inorganic textures: marble, granite, glass, rusted metal and pebbles.
• Metal textures: gold, silver and copper.
• Multiple colors for plastic texture.
• Easy to follow instructions for surface and die configuration.

Any questions or comments, contact us at azul3dapps@gmail.com
